txt.en: \qA Keen Blade\q is said to tell the tale of a guardian whose allies fell in combat and of his unending quest to find those who slew them and bring them to justice.

You have heard it whispered that the libraries of Moria yet contain many tomes, while many other volumes were brought by the dwarves seeking to reclaim their ancient realm. One such tome in the libraries of the Iron Garrison is said to be the legendary \qA Keen Blade.\q If you can gain enough favour with the Iron Garrison Guards, they may let you have their copy of this book.
